import { Navbar, NavDropdown, FormControl, Nav, Button, Form, Card, Carousel } from 'react-bootstrap'; import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import './App.css'; import Detail from './Detail.js'; import { Link, Route, Switch, useHistory } from 'react-router-dom'; import Account from './Account.js'; import axios from 'axios'; import Data from './Data'; function App() { let history = useHistory(); let [idInput,changeidInput] = useState(''); let [pwInput,changepwInput] = useState(''); let [nameInput,changenameInput] = useState(''); let [emailInput,changeemailInput] = useState(''); let [searchInput, changesearchInput] = useState(''); let [productData, changeProductData] = useState(Data); useEffect(()=>{axios.get('').then((result)=>{ changeProductData([...productData, ...result.data]) }).catch(()=>{ })}); return (
